Key: Hello? This is Itsuka.
Oh, Shido-kun? Perfect timing. Kannazuki,\nhere.

Kannazuki-san? What's the matter? You don't
usually call me. Did you want to speak to Kotori?
No. Today, I wanted to talk to you. You see,\nit's about Kaguya-san and Yuzuru-san.
Kaguya and Yuzuru? What happened?
You see, Shido-kun, please stay calm while\nI share this with you.

Hey, what is it? Wait. Don't tell me something
happened to them! Tell me!
Yes. You see... We are going to do some tests\nsoon.
...Tests?
Yes. Kaguya-san and Yuzuru-san will both\nhave to cooperate. It may take them the\nentire day.
Because they are most stable when they are\ntogether, we are afraid of only taking one. If\nonly one survives, then we want you there.
(I see...)
...*sigh*. Okay, got it. I understand.
Wonderful. Please invite them on a date.\nIf you would like, I have a recommendation.
No, that's fine.
Aw, your loss. So, which one will participate\nin the test, whom should I ask? Kaguya-san,\nor Yuzuru-san?
Wait, you're letting me decide?
Yes. I do not mind. I won't tell the other.
Well, if that's the case...
I want to spend time with Kaguya.
I want to spend time with Yuzuru.

(All things considered, I wanted to spend
time with Kaguya.)
I think she's almost here.
Oh, she just made it. Hey, hey.
Hehe. I've come for you, Shido...
Welcome, Kaguya.
Oh, uh, thank you for the invitation.

Why do you sound so formal? It's nothing
fancy.
R-Right... I will enter.

But you're sure you're okay to do this? It's
a date, but we're going to my room. We could
have gone out if you wanted.

Huh. Don't worry about it! I've always been
curious about your house, so fear not.
Really? If you say so. Kaguya...?

Hyah! What's the matter?
...Shido?

Well, you seem restless. You're acting weird.
Just wondering if everything's okay.

Oh, uh... Er, Yuzuru's not here, and I realized
it's been a while since we've been alone.
...I see. Being alone with me makes you nervous.

You don't have to put it that way! I-I mean,
who ya callin' nervous, mister?!
It's fine. I'm kinda nervous, too.
R-Really...?
Yeah, of course.

(But now that she's said it out loud, I'm getting
nervous too. Feeling restless.)

Oh, why don't I pour us some black tea? Is
that okay with you?
Yeah.
Here you go.
*stare*...
(She's not even blinking. This is uncomfortable.)
H-Hey, is something wrong, Kaguya?

O-Oh. Fret not, Shido! You're free to pour me
some tea.
Gotcha. If you say so.
*stare*...
Hehehe...

(She's a mystery. Oh, well. I'll pretend not
to let it bother me.)
Okay, here's your tea.

Kakaka. I sure got you working... Mm.
It's delicious.
Cool. Happy to hear it.
(After taking a sip of tea, I finally feel calm.)

(Normally, there are three of us at a time, so
Yuzuru's silence can be felt.)
Hey, Shido?
What's up?
Can I sit closer?
Sure...
Yay! Hehe... It's like we're dating.
Y-Yeah.
(I wonder if she's been waiting to ask me that.)

Hey, Kaguya? What made you want to come
over?

Kuku. Can't let the cat out of the bag. Maybe
use that big noggin of yours to figure it out.
Okay...

(Maybe, she just wanted a relaxing day at
my house.)
...! Sh-Shido! That! Is that what I think it is?!
Saying that" and "it" is confusing me.

Operator: You're pointing at my game console. You
know what that is, don't you?"

Key:
D-Don't make a fool of me. I know! But
I've never laid hands on it myself. Fuooo.
I'd sell my soul for this beautiful machine!

(She looks at it like it's a mythical creature.
It's almost hilarious picturing her with a
controller.)
Wanna play, Kaguya?
Yeah, totally!

Okay, let me start it up. Which game...?
How about a fighting game?

Kuku... Very well. Kuku. Time to take revenge
for our day at the arcade. I'll show you what
I'm made of.

Now, you have to choose your character.
Who do you want to use, Kaguya?

Hmm... This one. It looks like a bear. I like it.
Gonna crack your skull open.

Y-You sure chose a burly character. I thought
for sure you'd pick a girl.

Kuku. I'm not like other girls. So...
What about you, Shido?
I'll use this one!

Whoa, a fearsome warrior. A challenging test
indeed... But its head is rather strange. Almost
like a pineapp―

Oh. Not another word. You can decide how
strong it is on the battlefield.
Hehe. Then, prove your worth to me!

(And so, we began our game. We still had a
whole date ahead of us, so it wasn't going to
be a full-fledged battle.)

AY! You bastard! I can't perform combos,
Shidooo...
Okay, okay. I'll show you. Okay, use the pad.
Now's my chance! YAH!
Hey! You got the hang of it.

Hehe. Pretty easy when your opponent stands
still. Your fault for leaving your guard down.

Rgh... Fine then. I'll send you back to your
homeworld crying.

A-Aaaaah! The bear's HP... says otherwise!
I'm kicking. KICKING!
I can't go near you! Aah!
YAY! I win!
Grr... You got me.

Kakakaka! The burden of this grudge has
been lifted. Behold, the taste of victory!
Gone are the days of my accursed defeats!

(She's as giddy as a schoolgirl. Well, Kaguya's
happiness is all that matters to me.)

Shido, one more battle! Next time, I will
scrape you from the bottom of my foot!

Oh, feeling cocky? I won't let my guard down
this time.

Kuku... I have already mastered this game,
so you're only delaying the inevitable. We
can bet tomorrow's lunch if you'd like.

Ohh, you're on! Sorry, but you're going to
have to buy me a full-course meal at the
cafeteria tomorrow.

Hahaha. As if! Shido, get your wallet ready to
buy me every loaf of bread at the store! Even
if it kills you.
Bring it on!

(To no one's surprise, we ended up gaming
all day.)
Oh, look at the time. Let's call it.

What, already...? But I'm not done with you
yet...

Well, we still have tomorrow too! Let me walk
you home before it gets dark.
Okay. Thanks, Shido! Today was sweet.
Yeah!
I look forward to our next meeting.
Right...
I hope it's just you and me.
Next time, let's invite Yuzuru.
Let's make it just us again.

Very well... Wait, as much as I'd like to say
that, I couldn't exclude Yuzuru.

Huh? Oh, that's not what I meant. I mean,
we're dating, Kaguya. I appreciate our alone
time, too.

Kaguya, you really seemed to enjoy yourself
today. We don't always have to be a trio.
Hm... I don't know.

If you insist, then gimme a call.
I'll be waiting.
Huh?
Nothing! Anyways, thanks for today!
Okay. Next time, let's invite Yuzuru.
Huh? Oh her, huh.

But... I don't mind it being you and I from
time to time.
Huh? Kaguya, did you just...

O-Oh, forget I said that! I'm gonna head home
now! Peace!
Oh, Kaguya!!

(I wasn't reading into it too much that day.
I was only thinking of the fact we had a date
without Yuzuru. How was I to know...?)
